meanings.definition: A marine annelid worm with bristles on each segment.
meanings.sent1: I saw a chaetopod crawling on the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the chaetopod to learn more about its habitat.
meanings.sent3: The chaetopod tried to style its bristles for a fancy underwater party.
meanings.sent4: The chaetopod's bristles were like tiny brushes painting the sea floor.
meanings.sent5: The chaetopod's bristles shimmered in the sunlight, creating a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: Any member of the Chaetopoda, a group of annelid worms.
meanings.sent1: The chaetopod is a fascinating creature found in various marine environments.
meanings.sent2: Scientists discovered a new species of chaetopod living in the deep sea.
meanings.sent3: The chaetopod group had a meeting to discuss their next underwater adventure.
meanings.sent4: In the world of annelid worms, the chaetopod stood out as a resilient survivor.
meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the colorful chaetopods swimming gracefully in the aquarium.
